Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationImpl
    Authentication implementation for simple usage
    DeliveryRecipientStatusImpl
    Simple POJO implementation of DeliveryRecipientStatus
    DeliveryResultImpl
    Simple FutureResult implementation which holds an Iterator with all the DeliveryRecipientStatus instaces
    SMTPDeliveryAgentConfigImpl  
    SMTPDeliveryEnvelopeImpl
    Simple pojo implementation of a SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
    StrictLMTPDeliveryAgentConfig
    LMTP-Servers MUST support PIPELINING according the RFC.
